title: Support main LF a ranked team with ambition to climb ranks.
body: I am currently only bronze 4 (just got outta b5) so not very impressive but i feel i am better than my rank may suggest. I'm looking for a team willing to take me in. I would be available and open to training and learning anything you can teach. I'm a big believer in practice is perfect and so i am on almost everyday practicing. I am anti-toxic and want to play in a ranked team as i want to know the players i am supporting and really get a feel for they play style and adapt to it. I'm easy to get along with, i'm fine with the whole "chain of command" IF that's how your team works. Oh and i have skype but if i have to i can use teamspeak. Just add me in game or even reply to this thread if you want to gimme a chance.

replies.body: i got ranked bronze 1 but dropped to bronze 3 because of so many bad teams that i was in, wanna try play ranked together?
playing with better players is the best way to improve, good on you for attempting this, i dont have a team atm but you can add me if you want and i will give you tips
